subSections.title: Compounds
Etymology
subSections.text: Compound of {{compound|ja|sort=からす|から|tr1=kara|t1=caw|pos1=onomatopoeia|す|tr2=su|t2=bird?|pos2=ancient suffix appearing in certain bird names}}.<ref name="KDJ">{{R:Kokugo Dai Jiten}}</ref> Compare the {{m|ja|す|tr=su}} in {{m|ja|鶯|tr=uguisu}}, {{m|ja|杜鵑|tr=hototogisu}}.
